EmailTemplate.name: EM-202305-HHS-ENT-STROKE-AWARENESS-MO-Reputation.02 - Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Case study: Virtual care extends stroke program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Telestroke success at Hackensack Meridian Health In recognition of National Stroke Awareness Month, we’re sharing how our industry-leading telestroke solution is improving clinical outcomes at more than 350 hospital systems.
See how our partner Hackensack Meridian Health extended its stroke program’s reach and efficiency through our virtual care. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
